description: Cancels a job. Requires permission to access the CancelJob action.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The unique identifier you assigned to this job when it was created.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: (Optional) If true job executions with status 'IN_PROGRESS' and 'QUEUED' are canceled, otherwise only job executions with status 'QUEUED' are canceled. The default is false. Canceling a job which is 'IN_PROGRESS', will cause a device which is executing the job to be unable to update the job execution status. Use caution and ensure that each device executing a job which is canceled is able to recover to a valid state.

nested_items.name: jobId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier you assigned to this job when it was created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A short text description of the job.
